sendERC1155(address,address[],uint256[],.details: Send token ERC20 to multiple accounts. - `_tokenAddress`: address of token erc721 - `_recipients`: list of receiver's address. - `_ids`: list of NFT's ID will be sent. - `_values`: list of values corresponding to each id

sendERC20(address,address[],uint256[]).details: Send token ERC20 to multiple accounts. - `_tokenAddress`: address of token erc20 - `_recipients`: list of receiver's address. - `_values`: list of values in wei will be sent.

sendERC721(address,address[],uint256[]).details: Send token ERC20 to multiple accounts. - `_tokenAddress`: address of token erc721 - `_recipients`: list of receiver's address. - `_ids`: list of NFT's ID will be sent.

sendETH(address[],uint256[]).details: Send ETH to multiple accounts. - `_recipients`: list of receiver's address. - `_values`: list of values in wei will be sent.
